title: Game Pass API configuration schema
description: Validates configuration input for the Game Pass API script.

$schema.description: The JSON schema to use for the configuration file

markets.description: The two letter market codes for which to fetch games. The script will run once for each market code.

fetchConsole.description: Whether or not to fetch games available for console Game Pass.

fetchPC.description: Whether or not to fetch games available for PC Game Pass.

fetchEAPlay.description: Whether or not to fetch games available through EA Play.

outputIndexing.description: What kind of indexing the resulting JSON should use for the cleaned game properties.

oneOf.title: The game's title is used as the index.
The game's product Id is used as the index.

treatEmptyStringAsNull.description: Whether or not to treat empty strings as null values.

includedProperties.description: The properties that should be contained in the cleaned version of the API response.

productTitle.description: Whether or not to include the title of the game.

productId.description: Whether or not to include the product Id of the game.

developerName.description: Whether or not to include the name of the developer of the game.

publisherName.description: Whether or not to include the name of the publisher of the game.

enabled.description: Whether or not to include the description of the game.

preferShort.description: Whether or not to prefer the short description of the game, if one exists.

images.description: Whether or not to include image URL's for the game.

enabled.description: Whether or not to include any the images in the result.

imageTypes.description: What kinds of images should be considered, and a maximum of many of each type should be chosen. A value of -1 indicates no limit

TitledHeroArt.description: Banner featuring the game's name. 16:9 aspect ratio. E.g. https://store-images.s-microsoft.com/image/apps.12688.68326442227858632.03782b23-7f26-4a8e-ba87-177bdf2c3c90.ef4d4f2f-1865-4fa7-8ec7-8b914cd4dcc0

Poster.description: Banner featuring the game's name in portrait mode, such as for smartphones. 2:3 aspect ratio. E.g. https://store-images.s-microsoft.com/image/apps.64810.68326442227858632.03782b23-7f26-4a8e-ba87-177bdf2c3c90.fdefe49f-270c-44e5-b660-6d7764b37f0f

SuperHeroArt.description: Artwork without text. 16:9 aspect ratio. E.g. https://store-images.s-microsoft.com/image/apps.62159.68326442227858632.03782b23-7f26-4a8e-ba87-177bdf2c3c90.1405eb3a-6314-4e44-a822-7660d70a6ec5

Hero.description: Artwork without text. 2:1 aspect ratio. E.g. https://store-images.s-microsoft.com/image/apps.28129.13672427983916579.274b1ffd-9cde-4bef-9a3e-6f37073d5ed0.5eb8b4f3-3575-4d13-b0a4-b60d6c64f392

BoxArt.description: Banner featuring the game's logo and name in a square "box" format. 1:1 aspect ratio. E.g. https://store-images.s-microsoft.com/image/apps.4794.68326442227858632.03782b23-7f26-4a8e-ba87-177bdf2c3c90.b156af1e-9796-48af-8d11-3461727280ea

BrandedKeyArt.description: Banner featuring the game's name with a "XBOX" logo on top. 73:100 aspect ratio. E.g. https://store-images.s-microsoft.com/image/apps.27624.68326442227858632.21f49c7b-79d7-4647-b847-ecc7a34a7901.1aa31c66-2a52-45d6-8fed-badfb9f25ac6

FeaturePromotionalSquareArt.description: Banner featuring the game's logo (without name) in a square "box" format. 1:1 aspect ratio. E.g. https://store-images.s-microsoft.com/image/apps.29819.68326442227858632.03782b23-7f26-4a8e-ba87-177bdf2c3c90.322d4aa6-0a23-4565-a64f-743f0620a96e

Logo.description: Small, square game logo, to be used e.g. as a game library icon. 1:1 aspect ratio. E.g. https://store-images.s-microsoft.com/image/apps.65119.13664397958929388.0e87ac81-8aa3-41f0-82dc-61a295fc5fe3.44bf032a-b113-4179-aa1b-f557dbcd3b19

releaseDate.description: Whether or not to include the game's release date.

enabled.description: Whether or not to include the game's release date.

format.description: How to format the date string. Either the full dateTime (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.sssssssZ) or just the date (YYYY-MM-DD).

userRating.description: Whether or not to include the game's user rating.

enabled.description: Whether or not to include the game's user rating.

aggregationInterval.description: Which kind of interval to consider for rating aggregation.

format.description: How to format the rating. Either as the original x-out-of-5 stars value (0.0 - 5.0) or as a percentage (0.0 - 1.0).

pricing.description: Whether or not to include the game's price information. The currency that is used is dependent on the chosen "market".

enabled.description: Whether or not to include the game's price information. The currency that is used is dependent on the chosen "market".

priceTypes.description: Which kinds of prices to include. Choose from ListPrice, MSRP and WholesalePrice (i.e. applied sales).

anyOf.title: The current listing price in the store.
The wholesale price, i.e. the ListPrice after sales have been applied.

missingPricePolicy.description: What to do if a price is missing. Either "useZero", "useNull" or "useEmptyString".

categories.description: Whether or not to include the game's categories. This can be used as tags.
